thread.title: Internet rumors of deportation checkpoints are 'fake news,' designed to cause panic, authorities say

author: Veronica Rocha , Richard Winton

Gorsuch accepts Supreme Court nomination 
Neil M. Gorsuch, a highly regarded conservative jurist best known for upholding religious liberty rights in the legal battles over Obamacare, is President Trump's Supreme Court nominee.
